author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
This is a pure technical clean-up of SimG4Core/CustomPhysics sub-library: 
1) use correct C++ keywords;
2) removed old obsolete G4 disclaimer;
3) names of classes should not  start from "G4"
3) substitute old patterns for thread local objects

Expected no effect on any WF.

#### PR validation:
private


#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for: NO
title: [SIM] Clean up custom physics sub-library
